about_the_game:
DEMONS is a card game for 1-4 players. When an evil cult unleashes an ancient demon, all that can stop the coming apocalypse is you, your friends and a deck of cards.

STOP THE SUMMONING

  • Turn-based strategy

    No-one said taking on the forces of darkness was going to be easy. Your choices will affect the outcome for the whole team, so make each turn count.

  • Investigate terrifying locations

    Locate and destroy the ritual altars. You’ll find useful items such as charms, medkits and hatchets along the way, but beware of evil cultists and the demon itself!

  • Who’s your hero?
    Choose a unique character to play as each time you pursue victory against the cult.

FEATURES

  • 1-4 player online co-op
    Take control of up to 4 characters in this unique online co-op experience.

  • Single player mode
    Not for the faint of heart. In this mode, you’ll control all 4 characters and face the cult alone.

  • Replayability
    With fast and challenging gameplay, each unique playthrough of DEMONS is guaranteed to be a hair-raising experience.

  • Unlock rewards
    As you play, you’ll have the opportunity to unlock cosmetic rewards that you can use to customise your game board and new perk cards that will enhance your gameplay and give you and your team extra strategic options to help you win.

  • Immerse yourself
    Delve into a uniquely spine-chilling horror experience with stunning original art, music and sound effects.

Warning

This game contains flashing lights that may make it unsuitable for people with photosensitive epilepsy or other photosensitive conditions. Player discretion is advised.
